# PROJECT BLOCKING FOR UKRAINE AND EU TERRITORIES

## RESTRICTED ACCESS NOTICE

This project contains sensitive drone detection and spectrum analysis technology that is restricted for use in the following territories:

### PROHIBITED TERRITORIES
- **Ukraine** (UA)
- **European Union** (EU) member states:
  - Austria (AT), Belgium (BE), Bulgaria (BG), Croatia (HR), Cyprus (CY)
  - Czech Republic (CZ), Denmark (DK), Estonia (EE), Finland (FI)
  - France (FR), Germany (DE), Greece (GR), Hungary (HU)
  - Ireland (IE), Italy (IT), Latvia (LV), Lithuania (LT)
  - Luxembourg (LU), Malta (MT), Netherlands (NL), Poland (PL)
  - Portugal (PT), Romania (RO), Slovakia (SK), Slovenia (SI)
  - Spain (ES), Sweden (SE)

### TECHNICAL RESTRICTIONS
- GPS coordinates in prohibited territories will trigger automatic shutdown
- IP addresses from prohibited territories denied access
- Hardware serial numbers registered to prohibited territories blocked
- All drone detection and spectrum analysis functions disabled in restricted areas

### LEGAL NOTICE
Any attempt to circumvent these restrictions is illegal under international law and will result in immediate legal action.
